title: Why are rift rivals EUvsNa games coming in so late?
body:
Earliest game starts at 10.30 p.m....and the latest like 2 am.. couldnt they push them a little bit earlier ?
{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

replies.body: They don't want us to cheer on EU.

> [{quoted}](name=Stars Shaper,realm=EUW,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=LnWuEXxc,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-07-04T08:44:45.856+0000)
>
> They don't want us to cheer on EU.

That's it.  We don't want EU players in Los angeles to hear the Cheers from Berlin.  So we held it while Berlin is asleep.

> [{quoted}](name=Stars Shaper,realm=EUW,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=LnWuEXxc,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-07-05T07:27:22.205+0000)
>
> https://media.giphy.com/media/jXD7kFLwudbBC/giphy.gif

Yeah.  When your joke bombs so badly nobody even smiles let alone chuckles or laughs, claim it went over the audience's head.  Don't quit your day job.
Save the salt for the twitch/youtube chat.

Its around the same times they ran them last year for Berlin.

It's just that this year it's being held in NA so it's going by NA mid-day time instead.

> [{quoted}](name=ZiLess,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=LnWuEXxc,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-07-04T08:59:30.432+0000)
>
> Its around the same times they ran them last year for Berlin.
> 
> It's just that this year it's being held in NA so it's going by NA mid-day time instead.

It will be very hard to watch the late games........

> [{quoted}](name=xAreUmyDadx,realm=EUW,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=LnWuEXxc,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-07-04T09:35:45.721+0000)
>
> It will be very hard to watch the late games........

u cant be upset, na had to go through the same type of thing last year with it being so early in the morning that most of NA was still asleep
it was the same way for na watchers last year.  They just switched it so you get the short end of the stick this year

Like others have said think of this as a role-reversal for the two regions. Last year the games were played in Europe, meaning that North America couldn't watch the live games as easily as EU could, so it's only fair that this year it's EU who has to struggle to watch the games in NA. I understand your frustration but that's just the way it is.

Regardless if you can't catch the live broadcast there's always the Re-broadcast or the VODs.
